Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Bow = Tool.Handle
local myCharacter = Tool.Parent local myHumanoid local myTorso local myPlayer local TargetPoint
local defensiveModeOn if not Tool:FindFirstChild("DefensiveModeOn") then defensiveModeOn = false else defensiveModeOn = Tool.DefensiveModeOn.Value end
if myCharacter then myHumanoid = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if defensiveModeOn then if myTorso then TargetPoint = myTorso.Position end else if myHumanoid then TargetPoint = myHumanoid.TargetPoint end end end
local TargetedPart if defensiveModeOn and myTorso then TargetedPart = myTorso else TargetedPart = Tool:FindFirstChild("TargetedPart") if TargetedPart then TargetedPart = TargetedPart.Value end end
local inAir = true
local SPEED = 50 local ACCURACY if defensiveModeOn then ACCURACY = .25 else ACCURACY = .15 end
local idealVelocity
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local Mouse = Tool:FindFirstChild("Mouse") if Mouse then Mouse = Mouse.Value end
local ActualTarget local TargetWeld
local HitWeld local recentlyHit = false
if TargetPoint and TargetedPart then ActualTarget = Instance.new("Part") ActualTarget.formFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom ActualTarget.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) ActualTarget.Transparency = 1.0 ActualTarget.Name = "PumpkinCrossbowTarget" ActualTarget.CanCollide = false ActualTarget.CFrame = CFrame.new(TargetPoint) ActualTarget.Parent = game.Workspace
TargetWeld = Instance.new("Weld") TargetWeld.Part0 = TargetedPart TargetWeld.Part1 = ActualTarget TargetWeld.C1 = ActualTarget.CFrame:inverse() * TargetedPart.CFrame TargetWeld.Parent = ActualTarget end
local Bolt = Instance.new("Part") Bolt.Name = "PumpkinBolt" Bolt.formFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Bolt.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.3, 1.9) Bolt.CanCollide = false Bolt.Locked = true Bolt.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Neon orange") Bolt.Material = "Wood"
local BoltMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") BoltMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=58553264" BoltMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=58367341" BoltMesh.Parent = Bolt
local AntiGrav = Instance.new("BodyForce") AntiGrav.force = Vector3.new(0, 196.2 * Bolt:GetMass(), 0) AntiGrav.Parent = Bolt
local CackleSound CackleSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("Cackle") if CackleSound then CackleSound = CackleSound:Clone() CackleSound.Parent = Bolt end
local ScreamSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("Scream") if ScreamSound then ScreamSound = ScreamSound:Clone() ScreamSound.Parent = Bolt end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local CreatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") CreatorTag.Value = player CreatorTag.Name = "creator" if humanoid then CreatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) local Tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if Tag then Tag:Remove() end end
function weldAndMaim(hit) local otherChar = hit.Parent if TargetedPart then local TargetedObject = TargetedPart.Parent if TargetedObject then if TargetedObject == otherChar or (TargetedObject.ClassName == "Hat" and TargetedObject.Parent == otherChar) then local otherHumanoid = otherChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if otherHumanoid and otherHumanoid.ClassName == "Humanoid" and not recentlyHit then recentlyHit = true myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(myCharacter) tagHumanoid(otherHumanoid, myPlayer) otherHumanoid:TakeDamage(30) HitWeld = Instance.new("Weld") HitWeld.Part0 = hit HitWeld.Part1 = Bolt HitWeld.C1 = Bolt.CFrame:inverse() * hit.CFrame HitWeld.Parent = Bolt if AntiGrav then AntiGrav:Remove() end if CackleSound then CackleSound:Stop() end if ScreamSound then ScreamSound:Play() end wait(1) untagHumanoid(otherHumanoid) end end end end end
function defensiveWeldAndMaim(hit) local otherCharacter = hit.Parent if otherCharacter then if otherCharacter ~= myCharacter then local otherHumanoid = otherCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if otherHumanoid and otherHumanoid.ClassName == "Humanoid" and not recentlyHit then recentlyHit = true myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(myCharacter) tagHumanoid(otherHumanoid, myPlayer) otherHumanoid:TakeDamage(30) HitWeld = Instance.new("Weld") HitWeld.Part0 = hit HitWeld.Part1 = Bolt HitWeld.C1 = Bolt.CFrame:inverse() * hit.CFrame HitWeld.Parent = Bolt if AntiGrav then AntiGrav:Remove() end if CackleSound then CackleSound:Stop() end if ScreamSound then ScreamSound:Play() end wait(1) untagHumanoid(otherHumanoid) end end end end
if defensiveModeOn then Bolt.Touched:connect(defensiveWeldAndMaim) else Bolt.Touched:connect(weldAndMaim) end
Bolt.CFrame = Bow.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) * CFrame.new(0, 0.42, -0.45) if defensiveModeOn then Bolt.Velocity = SPEED * Vector3.new(math.random() - 0.5, math.random() - 0.5, math.random() - 0.5).unit else Bolt.Velocity = SPEED * Bolt.CFrame.lookVector end Bolt.Parent = game.Workspace debris:AddItem(Bolt, 10) if CackleSound then CackleSound:Play() end
if ActualTarget then idealVelocity = SPEED * (ActualTarget.Position - Bolt.Position).unit else idealVelocity = Bolt.Velocity end
while Bolt do if not recentlyHit then if ActualTarget then idealVelocity = SPEED * (ActualTarget.Position - Bolt.Position).unit end Bolt.Velocity = SPEED * (Bolt.Velocity + ACCURACY * (idealVelocity - Bolt.Velocity)).unit Bolt.CFrame = CFrame.new(Bolt.Position, Bolt.Position + Bolt.Velocity) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) end wait() end
if CackleSound then CackleSound:Stop() end if ActualTarget then ActualTarget:Remove() end wait(2) -- For the wait in weldAndMaim script:Remove()

math.randomseed(tick()); math.random()
function waitForChild(parent, childName) while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
local Tool = script.Parent
local ProjectileScript
local myMouse local TargetedPart
local ScreenGui local Frame local ModeActivated local PressXToSwitch
local myCharacter local myPlayer
local DefensiveModeVal = Tool:FindFirstChild("DefensiveModeOn") if DefensiveModeVal then defensiveModeOn = DefensiveModeVal.Value else defensiveModeOn = false end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false ProjectileScript = Tool:FindFirstChild("PumpkinXBowProjScript") if ProjectileScript then if DefensiveModeVal.Value then for i = 1, 10 do local NewProjectileScript = ProjectileScript:Clone() NewProjectileScript.Parent = Tool NewProjectileScript.Disabled = false end local LongDisableScript = waitForChild(script, "LongDisable"):Clone() LongDisableScript.Parent = Tool LongDisableScript.Disabled = false else TargetedPart = Tool:FindFirstChild("TargetedPart") if TargetedPart then TargetedPart.Value = myMouse.Target end ProjectileScript = ProjectileScript:Clone() ProjectileScript.Parent = Tool ProjectileScript.Disabled = false local ShortDisableScript = waitForChild(script, "ShortDisable"):Clone() ShortDisableScript.Parent = Tool ShortDisableScript.Disabled = false end end end
function switchModes(key) if key:lower() ~= "x" then return end if DefensiveModeVal then DefensiveModeVal.Value = not DefensiveModeVal.Value if ModeActivated then if DefensiveModeVal.Value then ModeActivated.Text = "DEFENSIVE MODE ON" ModeActivated.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 1) else ModeActivated.Text = "OFFENSIVE MODE ON" ModeActivated.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) end end end end
function onEquipped(mouse) if mouse then myMouse = mouse myMouse.KeyDown:connect(switchModes) end DefensiveModeVal = waitForChild(Tool, "DefensiveModeOn") ScreenGui = waitForChild(Tool, "PumpkinCrossbowGui"):Clone() Frame = waitForChild(ScreenGui, "Frame") ModeActivated = waitForChild(Frame, "ModeActivated") PressXToSwitch = waitForChild(Frame, "PressXToSwitch")
if DefensiveModeVal.Value then ModeActivated.Text = "DEFENSIVE MODE ON" ModeActivated.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 1) else ModeActivated.Text = "OFFENSIVE MODE ON" ModeActivated.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) end
myCharacter = Tool.Parent if myCharacter then myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(myCharacter) ScreenGui.Parent = myPlayer.PlayerGui end end
function onUnequipped() if ScreenGui then ScreenGui:Remove() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

-- Necessary only because Local Scripts stop running when a tool is backspaced, so we -- can't rely on the LS to update Tool.Enabled as it should. local Tool = script.Parent
wait(13) Tool.Enabled = true
script:Remove()

-- Necessary only because Local Scripts stop running when a tool is backspaced, so we -- can't rely on the LS to update Tool.Enabled as it should. local Tool = script.Parent
wait(2) Tool.Enabled = true
script:Remove()

Properties.string: Press X to switch between offensive and defensive modes.

Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
